content:
Select an appropriate conclusion for this short story.
Once upon a time, there was a brave little rabbit named Wilbur. He had been living in the forest for some time, and he was tired of living all alone. All of the other forest animals were friendly to him, but he wanted to find someone who he could really connect with and be best friends with. Wilbur decided he would set out on a big journey to find just the right friend.

After traveling through lush meadows and dense woods, Wilbur finally reached a vibrant meadow where animals of all kinds gathered. There, he met a wise old turtle named Oliver who had seen the world and learned its secrets. Wilbur and Oliver shared stories, laughed together, and discovered they complemented each other perfectly. Wilbur found the connection he had been searching for, realizing that true friendship often appears when you least expect it. Wilbur and Oliver returned to the forest together, where they became inseparable companions, sharing adventures and building a life filled with joy and camaraderie.
